title: Much-Needed RETURN From Vacation
itunes:title: Much-Needed RETURN From Vacation
description:
MON 7/11 – The Breakfast Club returned from vacation, spilling over with emotion and dialogue after last week’s tragedies in Louisiana, Minnesota & Texas. We simply opened up the phone lines to discuss your take on what happened and what NEEDS to happen.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
